techmeme.title: Apple says Messages will support RCS in iOS 18, replacing SMS as the default communication protocol between Android and iOS devices, but gives few details (Allison Johnson/The Verge)
Apple unveils Apple Intelligence on macOS and iOS, with system-wide tools for writing and making "totally original" images, custom task orchestration, and more (Brian Heater/TechCrunch)
Apple unveils Passwords, an app to let users save logins, create passwords, import passwords from third-party services, across platforms including Windows PCs (Kerry Wan/ZDNet)
Apple unveils macOS Sequoia, with iPhone mirroring, audio streaming, and notifications even while the iPhone is locked, Safari AI-powered highlights, and more (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Apple unveils iPadOS 18, adding iOS 18-style Home Screen customization, tab bars and in-app animations updates, a Calculator app, and Pencil handwriting updates (Ryan Christoffel/9to5Mac)
